.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task RenewSessionLockAsync(valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed

abstract member RenewSessionLockAsync : System.Threading.CancellationToken -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task override this.RenewSessionLockAsync : System.Threading.CancellationToken -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task

Docs.param: An optional instance to signal the request to cancel the operation.
Docs.summary: Renews the lock on the session specified by the . The lock will be renewed based on the setting specified on the entity.

remarks.para: When you get session receiver, the session is locked for this receiver by the service for a duration as specified during the Queue/Subscription creation. If processing of the session requires longer than this duration, the session-lock needs to be renewed. For each renewal, it resets the time the session is locked by the LockDuration set on the Entity.
Renewal of session renews all the messages in the session as well. Each individual message need not be renewed.
